laboratory_examinations.findings: 0/68,900 TRECs per microliter, indicating profound T-cell lymphopenia.

CD3+ T-cell count: 182 cells/μl (abnormal), CD4+ helper T-cell count: 130 cells/μl (abnormal), CD8+ cytotoxic T-cell count: 26 cells/μl (abnormal), CD45+ lymphocytes proliferating in response to PHA: 18% (abnormal)
CD3+ T-cell count: 2157 cells/μl, CD4+ helper T-cell count: 1239 cells/μl, CD8+ cytotoxic T-cell count: 826 cells/μl, CD45+ lymphocytes proliferating in response to PHA: 100% (normal)
laboratory_examinations.changes_over_time: Improvement in counts and function after hematopoietic stem cell transplant.
